title: My Husband Refuses To Sell His “Fun” Car so We Can Buy a House (Hour 3)
description:
Rachel Cruze & Ken Coleman discuss:

A husband who refuses to sell his "fun" car to help buy a new house,

What to do with extra savings,

Combining finances after marriage,

What to do with a car,

Arguing with a spouse about paying off the house.


Support Our Sponsor:
PODS Moving & Storage

Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
